entry.title: IRC logs: BIP 119 Workshop
entry.summary: In the realm of Bitcoin development, an upcoming workshop is scheduled to take place on 11 September 2025 at 15:00 UTC. This event is set to be hosted on the ctv-csfs-activation channel on libera.chat. The primary focus of this workshop revolves around two critical areas within the Bitcoin protocol enhancement efforts: the review and comprehension of BIP 348 and the creation of CSFS transactions on signet. For those interested in deepening their understanding or contributing to these technical discussions, detailed logs from previous workshops are available for review at [https://ctv-csfs-workshops.github.io/bip119/logs](https://ctv-csfs-workshops.github.io/bip119/logs). This initiative is part of a broader engagement strategy aimed at fostering community participation and knowledge sharing within the Bitcoin Development Mailing List group, as indicated by the sender's affiliation with this online community. This gathering promises to be an invaluable resource for developers keen on exploring the intricacies of Bitcoin's protocol enhancements and transaction mechanisms.
